page.title: 08A shop in Ipswich .
page.content: Moons,The Walk. This shop contains modern stationary such as transparent ink pens and colourful biros with their ends twisted round into words.Also in Moons there are rubbers ,stickers , pencils and patterned writing paper . Upstairs there is a gift department which has various things including china figures , mugs , sticks of rock and candles. We did a survey to find out how many people used Moons , for what and how often . Here are our results :- 100% used Moons . 71.5% bought stickers at Moons . The other 28.5% bought rubbers , pencils and pens . 85.5% visited Moons regually .
